I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself.
I treat myself to something I've been wanting.

I loved playing with my brother when we were kids.

participant_2.background:
I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer.
i m always hungry.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Hey, it's going well! Just got back from a vacation, I proposed to my significant other and they said yes!
That's amazing! Congratulations!
Thanks! I'm so happy.
I'm sure you are. So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a video game designer. Just graduated from college a few months ago and got my first job.
That's cool! I've always wanted to be a video game designer.
It's really fun! I'm enjoying it so far.
I'm glad to hear that. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, of course, but I also like to go hiking and spend time with my pets.
That sounds like fun. I like to play video games too, but I also like to go to the movies and read books.
I like to read books too, but I don't go to the movies very often.
Why not?
I don't really like crowds.
I can understand that. I don't like crowds either.
So, what do you like to do when you're not working?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I also like to go out and explore new places.
That sounds like fun. I like to do those things too.
Good! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too.
